description:
Tachibana-sensei is the new, fearful advisory teacher for the Art Club. Colette goes for a walk, putting herself at risk of being melted by the day star. Subaru offers to bring Mizuki`s print-outs to her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bijutsubu e Youkoso / Kore Sanpo / Sukoshi Zutsu, Chotto Zutsu
Welcome to the Art Club / Colette`s Walk / Little by Little, Bit by Bit
مرحبًا في نادي الفنون / نزهة كوليت / رويدًا رويدًا، شيئًا فشيئًا
美術部へようこそ / コレさんぽ / 少しずつ, ちょっとずつ
